commit_message:
perf(fe): optimize debug builds by >20%

Reduce narrow_cast overhead.

    $ # Before:
    $ hyperfine './build/quick-lint-js --language=experimental-typescript ~/Downloads/checker.ts'
    Benchmark 1: ./build/quick-lint-js --language=experimental-typescript ~/Downloads/checker.ts
      Time (mean ± σ):      1.376 s ±  0.002 s    [User: 1.369 s, System: 0.007 s]
      Range (min … max):    1.373 s …  1.379 s    10 runs

    $ # After:
    $ hyperfine './build/quick-lint-js --language=experimental-typescript ~/Downloads/checker.ts'
    Benchmark 1: ./build/quick-lint-js --language=experimental-typescript ~/Downloads/checker.ts
      Time (mean ± σ):     979.0 ms ±   1.7 ms    [User: 969.5 ms, System: 7.5 ms]
      Range (min … max):   976.6 ms … 981.1 ms    10 runs
